title: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area: Popular Riding Sites
body: Popular Riding Sites       There are miles and miles of trails, both single track and fireroads, in the mountains. Below are some popular mountain biking sites located on National Park Service land. Popular Mountain Biking Locations:  Cheeseboro/Palo Comado Canyon Zuma/Trancas Canyon Rancho Sierra Vista to Point Mugu (Biking is not permitted in the Boney Mountain Wilderness or in the Satwiwa Natural Area.)
